CustomField.description: Used on the Sapper Content Scorecard
CustomField.formula: (CASE(Clear__c, "1",1, "2",2, 0)+ CASE(Concise__c, "1",1, "2",2, 0)+ CASE(Compelling__c , "1",1, "2",2, 0)+ CASE(Clever__c, "1",1, "2",2, 0)+ CASE(Human__c, "1",1, "2",2, 0)+ CASE(Subject_Line__c, "1",1, "2",2, 0)+ CASE(Pain_Points__c, "1",1, "2",2, 0)+ CASE(Readability__c, "1",1, "2",2, 0)+ CASE(Cleanliness__c, "1",1, "2",2, 0))/18
CustomField.label: Content Quality Score
